com.eemi.ext4j.client.selection

Class SelectionModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.eemi.ext4j.client.core.JsObject
      • com.eemi.ext4j.client.core.ObservableJso
        • com.eemi.ext4j.client.selection.SelectionModel
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CellSelectionModel, CheckBoxSelectionModel, CopyOfRowSelectionModel, RowSelectionModel, TreeSelectionModel

    public class SelectionModel
extends ObservableJso
    Tracks what records are currently selected in a databound component.

      • selectRange

        public void selectRange(int startRow,
               int endRow)
        Selects a range of rows if the selection model is not locked. All rows in between startRow and endRow are also selected..

      • selectRange

        public void selectRange(int startRow,
               int endRow,
               boolean keepExisting)
        Selects a range of rows if the selection model is not locked. All rows in between startRow and endRow are also selected..

      • setLastFocused

        public void setLastFocused(BaseModel record)
        Sets a record as the last focused record. This does NOT mean that the record has been selected.

      • setLocked

        public void setLocked(boolean locked)
        Locks the current selection and disables any changes from happening to the selection.
